DarkMouse::

She couldn't help but feel ill at ease with all of this. But she did 
need some minor repairs. Besides, she was a master of escape. If 
things went wrong, she would just up and leave. She put her pistol 
away.  She looked at the ground for a moment,shrugged her shoulders 
sighed. "Well, here's goes nothing." She looked up at 
Galvatron. "Sure, why not." She took his hand and wondered just how 
much she'd regret making this decision. "So where to?"
Even if he went back on his word, she still had her old ace in the 
hole. Her energon. 




--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:

destron. A 
> destron commander in fact. Please." he extended his hand. "Come 
we'll you get 
> you something to eat and repairs if need. I promise no harm will 
come you. 
> Though that may not  be a big trust factor...I hope you'll come 
with me." he 
> smiled and bowed his head to the lady.
